restaurants.name: The Foodie's Delight
restaurants.description: A cozy restaurant with a wide variety of delicious dishes.

menuItems.name: Pasta Carbonara
menuItems.description: Spaghetti with creamy bacon and cheese sauce.

menuItems.name: Grilled Salmon
menuItems.description: Freshly grilled salmon fillet served with seasonal vegetables.

menuItems.name: Tiramisu
menuItems.description: Classic Italian dessert with coffee-flavored mascarpone.

restaurants.name: Spice Garden
restaurants.description: A vibrant restaurant specializing in spicy cuisines from around the world.

menuItems.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
menuItems.description: Tender pieces of chicken in a creamy tomato-based sauce.

menuItems.name: Pad Thai
menuItems.description: Thai stir-fried noodles with tofu, shrimp, and peanuts.

menuItems.name: Mango Lassi
menuItems.description: Refreshing yogurt-based drink with mango pulp.

restaurants.name: Burger Haven
restaurants.description: Your go-to place for gourmet burgers and fries.

menuItems.name: Classic Cheeseburger
menuItems.description: Juicy beef patty topped with cheddar cheese and fresh vegetables.

menuItems.name: Truffle Fries
menuItems.description: Crispy fries tossed in truffle oil and sprinkled with Parmesan.

menuItems.name: Oreo Milkshake
menuItems.description: Rich milkshake with chunks of Oreo cookies.
